name: Halfling
summary: The Halflings of the Talenta Plains are ferocious, tribal warriors, that breed and ride dinosaurs. They mostly worship totem spirits of dinosaurs and other beasts.
Khorvaire halflings are quick and charming, putting their natural talents to use as bards, barristers, merchants, and politicians throughout Khorvaire.
There is a halfling-run criminal enterprise called the Boromar Clan, the most powerful crime syndicate in Breland with powerful influence in both the underground and political spectrum.
characteristics: Halflings are 3 feet tall, kind, curious, and practical humanoids.
prompts: Did you serve as a mercenary in the Last War?
Are you from the Talenta Plains or somewhere else in Khorvaire?
What is your relationship to the dinosaur spirits, if any?
Are you a part of the Boromar Clan criminal organization?
Are you a part of the healing House of Jorasco or bear the Mark of Healing?
Are you a part of the hospitality house of Ghallanda or bear the Mark of Hospitality?
